title: Designing Educational Videos with Segmented and Generative Activities: For Advanced Learners in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Video-based learning in real-time online environments linked to discussion and project activities

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to reproduce content with over 80% accuracy after watching educational videos.
Learners achieve a 90% participation rate through generative activities (quizzes, case analyses, etc.) within videos.
Learners can design and present team projects based on video learning content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
